sources.title: Data Observability: The Next Frontier of Data Engineering
sources.synthesis: Data observability requires monitoring freshness, volume, schema, and quality. Automated alerts enable proactive data management.

sources.title: Apache Iceberg Snapshot Metadata and Time Travel
sources.synthesis: Iceberg snapshots contain commit timestamps and statistics. Time-travel queries enable historical analysis and freshness monitoring.

sources.title: Model Context Protocol Specification
sources.synthesis: MCP enables tool-based agent orchestration. Agents can trigger other agents via standardized tool invocations.
